channel.title: Moparpkz
channel.description:
Hiya all :) i am hear a a request and was hoping somebody could do it for me?
Theme: Well my site is to do about private servers so maybe um, some cash and a party hat. that would be very nice :)
Text: I would like a simple kinda glass texture text that says Moparpkz, then under kinda small saying " Bringing you a better game" The text should be blue.
Background: Something kinda glasses again to make it look very cool.
Font: Something alog the lines of the banner text on this forum
Size: 500 X 100 would be great!
Thanks for your time and i look foward to what people create for me :)
